sentences.sentence: Mycological aspects of the indoor environment.
sentences.translation: 室内的环境的真菌学的方面。

sentences.sentence: The importance of fixation in field in mycological study was discussed.
sentences.translation: 就野外固定在真菌学研究中的重要性进行了讨论。

sentences.sentence: Results The overall clinical and mycological efficacy rate was 96.67% and 96.7% respectively.
sentences.translation: 结果临床疗效评价和真菌疗效评价，总有效率分别为96.67%和96.7%。
